description_bullets: Integrated Testing into Continuous Integration (CI) Pipeline, ensuring robust code delivery.
Utilized Linting Tools (ESLint and SonarQube) for Comprehensive Code Scanning, enhancing code quality and maintainability.
Streamlined Deployment Workflow by Containerizing the Application Stack with Docker, reducing setup complexities.
Standardized Multi-Website Deployment onto a single VPS with Reverse Proxies (Nginx and Traefik), improving resource utilization and performance.
Implemented Comprehensive Monitoring with Prometheus, Grafana, and UptimeKuma, and deployed Node Exporters using Ansible for server monitoring.
Set up Proactive Alerts via email and Slack notifications, ensuring prompt issue detection and resolution.
Designed and Automated Workflow for the Preview Branch, covering building app components, pushing images to Docker Hub, and deploying the stack on a VPS environment.

Developed a geolocation system using a raspberry pi and a GPS module to track the location of the vehicle in real time using the MQTT protocol.
Keywords : Raspberry Pi , Microcontroller , UART , Embedded Systems , GPS , MQTT.
